item.title: 旧金山就超加工食品起诉卡夫和梦迪尔兹公司
item.description: 本周二，旧金山市起诉了卡夫、Mondelez、可口可乐和其他超加工食品制造商，指控他们在知情的情况下，用令人上瘾的有害产品恶心加州居民。【原文：The city of San Francisco sued Kraft , Mondelez , Coca-Cola and other makers of ultra-processed foods on Tuesday, accusing them of knowingly sickening California residents with addictive and harmful products.】

item.title: 俄罗斯外贸银行（VTB）看中美资公司，力争打造农业领域的冠军企业
item.description: 俄罗斯第二大银行 VTB 首席执行官安德烈-科斯汀（Andrei Kostin）周二表示，该公司正在洽谈收购一家大型农业生产商，这是该公司打造全国农业冠军的努力的一部分。【原文：Russia's second-largest bank VTB is in talks to buy a major agricultural producer, CEO Andrei Kostin said on Tuesday, as part of its drive to create a national champion in the sector.】

item.title: Instacart 因工人工资和小费法起诉纽约市
item.description: Instacart 周二起诉纽约市，要求阻止执行影响这家食品杂货配送公司的五项法律，包括有关应用程序员工最低工资和向客户披露小费的规定。【原文：Instacart sued New York City on Tuesday to block enforcement of five laws affecting the grocery delivery company, including rules governing minimum pay for app-based workers and disclosures to customers about tipping.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉副总统拒绝出售 Citgo 母公司
item.description: 委内瑞拉副总统兼石油部长德尔西-罗德里格斯（Delcy Rodriguez）周二表示，在美国法官上周批准出售炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 的母公司之后，委内瑞拉拒绝接受美国法律程序中的 "欺诈性 "和 "强迫性 "出售。【原文：Venezuelan Vice President and Oil Minister Delcy Rodriguez said on Tuesday the South American country rejects the 'fraudulent' and 'forced' sale of the parent company of refiner Citgo Petroleum in a legal process in the United States, after the sale was authorized by a U.S. judge last week.】

item.title: 联合国贸易机构称，全球金融体系必须进行调整以更好地服务于经济
item.description: 联合国贸易和发展会议（UN Trade and Development Agency）周二表示，如果金融体系不能适应经济发展的需要，就有可能破坏全球贸易，而发展中国家可能受害最深。【原文：The financial system risks undermining global trade if it fails to adapt to the economy's needs, with developing countries likely to suffer the most, the UN Trade and Development Agency said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 策略的杠杆 ETF 因加密货币低迷而遭受重创
item.description: 与比特币囤积者策略公司（Strategy）有关的杠杆式交易所交易基金（ETF）是今年加密货币市场低迷的最大受害者之一，因为比特币价格下跌打击了最大的代币企业持有者的股票。【原文：Leveraged exchange‑traded funds (ETFs) linked to bitcoin hoarder Strategy are among the biggest casualties of this year's crypto slump, as falling bitcoin price battered shares of the largest corporate holder of the token.】

item.title: 特朗普称明年初将宣布美联储新主席人选
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二表示，他将在明年初宣布美联储下任主席人选。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he would be announcing his selection for the next chair of the Federal Reserve early next year.】

item.title: 贡渥集团新任首席执行官在联合创始人离职后强调大宗商品交易商一切照旧
item.description: 贡渥集团（GGL.UL）新任首席执行官加里-佩德森（Gary Pedersen）周二在接受路透社采访时强调，这家总部位于瑞士的大宗商品交易商一切照旧，他上任前一天，联合创始人托尔比约恩-托恩奎斯特（Torbjorn Tornqvist）突然被管理层收购。【原文：Gunvor's (GGL.UL) new CEO, Gary Pedersen, stressed it was business as usual for the Swiss-based commodities trader during a Reuters interview on Tuesday, a day after he took over as part of an abrupt management buyout of co-founder Torbjorn Tornqvist.】

item.title: 爱尔兰媒体监管机构对 TikTok 和 LinkedIn 展开调查
item.description: 爱尔兰媒体监管机构周二开始对 TikTok 和 LinkedIn 进行调查，因为人们担心这两家公司的非法内容举报机制不便于使用，或者不允许人们匿名举报儿童性虐待材料。【原文：Ireland's media regulator began investigations into TikTok and LinkedIn on Tuesday over concerns that their illegal content reporting mechanisms are not easy to access or do not allow people to report child sexual abuse material anonymously.】

item.title: 消息人士称，花旗集团聘请美国银行高管推动大宗商品经纪业务
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士透露，花旗集团已聘请美国银行高管吉利安-斯奈德（Jillian Snyder）担任北美地区资本引进主管。【原文：Citigroup has hired Bank of America executive Jillian Snyder as its head of capital introductions for North America, a person familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 英伟达首席财务官称芯片制造商尚未敲定1000亿美元的OpenAI交易
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）首席财务官科莱特-克雷斯（Colette Kress）周二在亚利桑那州举行的瑞银全球技术与人工智能大会上表示，英伟达与 ChatGPT 母公司 OpenAI 达成的向这家初创公司投资高达 1000 亿美元的协议仍未最终敲定。【原文：Nvidia's agreement with ChatGPT parent OpenAI to invest up to $100 billion in the startup is still not finalized, the chipmaker's chief financial officer Colette Kress said on Tuesday at the UBS Global Technology and AI Conference in Arizona.】

item.title: 谷歌支持的 TAE Technologies 与英国核机构成立合资公司
item.description: 由 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司和雪佛龙公司支持的私营公司 TAE Technologies 周二表示，它已与英国核机构组建了一家合资企业，共同开发核聚变用中性束。【原文：TAE Technologies, a private company backed by Alphabet's Google and Chevron , said on Tuesday it had formed a joint venture with the United Kingdom's nuclear agency to develop neutral beams for nuclear fusion.】

item.title: 中国审查机构打击网上对房地产行业的 "厄运预言
item.description: 中国网络空间监管机构上海分部周二表示，在房地产长期低迷的情况下，该机构删除了数千篇 "对房地产市场进行末日预言和对住房政策进行歪曲解读 "的网络帖子。【原文：The Shanghai branch of China's cyberspace regulator said on Tuesday that it removed thousands of online posts for "doom-mongering the real estate market and distorting interpretations of housing policies", amid a prolonged property slump.】

item.title: 亚马逊将在人工智能芯片中使用英伟达技术，并推出新服务器
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）的AWS云计算部门周二表示，将在其未来几代人工智能计算芯片中采用英伟达（Nvidia）的关键技术，因为该公司正在加大力度争取主要的人工智能客户使用其服务。【原文：Amazon.com's AWS cloud computing unit on Tuesday said it will adopt key Nvidia technology in future generations of its artificial intelligence computing chips as the firm ramps up efforts to get major AI customers using its services.】

item.title: 受电动汽车拖累，福特 11 月美国销量略有下降
item.description: 福特汽车公司（Ford Motor Co）周二报告称，11月份美国汽车销量出现小幅下降，原因是税收抵免政策结束后，福特电动汽车的销量出现下滑。【原文：Ford Motor Co on Tuesday reported a marginal drop in its U.S. auto sales in November, as sales of its electric vehicles fizzled following the end of tax credits.】

item.title: H&M 宣布与斯特拉-麦卡特尼（Stella McCartney）设计师合作
item.description: 英国时装设计师斯特拉-麦卡特尼（Stella McCartney）将与瑞典时装巨头 H&M 合作推出一个系列。【原文：British fashion designer Stella McCartney will produce a collection in collaboration with H&M , the Swedish budget fashion giant said on Tuesday.】

item.title: CVS 将支付 3780 万美元解决胰岛素笔索赔案
item.description: 美国曼哈顿联邦检察官杰伊-克莱顿（Jay Clayton）周二表示，CVS Health 将支付 3776 万美元，以了结其向患者配发过多胰岛素笔，然后从医疗保险、医疗补助和其他政府医疗保健项目中获得不当报销的指控。【原文：CVS Health will pay $37.76 million to settle allegations it dispensed too many insulin pens to patients, and then obtained improper reimbursements from Medicare, Medicaid and other government healthcare programs, U.S. Attorney Jay Clayton in Manhattan said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主席呼吁重新制定高管薪酬披露规则
item.description: 华尔街首席监管者周二在纽约证券交易所发表讲话称，美国证券交易委员会应改革要求披露高管薪酬的规则，并应采取行动减轻小公司面临的法律负担。【原文：Wall Street's chief regulator said in an address at the New York Stock Exchange on Tuesday that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission should reform rules requiring disclosure of executive compensation and should move to reduce the legal burdens facing smaller companies.】

item.title: Axiado 为节省人工智能数据中心空间和电力的芯片融资 1 亿美元
item.description: Axiado 是一家位于硅谷的初创公司，它正在制造一种旨在为人工智能服务器节省空间和电力的芯片。【原文：Axiado, a Silicon Valley-based startup that is making a chip designed to save space and power in artificial intelligence servers, said on Tuesday it has raised $100 million in fresh capital.】

item.title: 沃尔玛投资 3.5 亿美元兴建美国第二家牛奶加工厂
item.description: 沃尔玛周二表示，该公司已在美国开设了第二家牛奶加工厂，投资额达 3.5 亿美元，因为这家美国零售商正努力加强其供应链，满足人们对物美价廉的乳制品的需求。【原文：Walmart said on Tuesday it had opened a second milk processing facility in the United States at an investment of $350 million, as the U.S. retailer seeks to strengthen its supply chain and meet demand for affordable dairy products.】

item.title: 独家：法庭文件显示，爱马仕继承人在股份失踪民事诉讼中将矛头指向路威酩轩集团的阿尔诺
item.description: 据路透社查阅的一份诉讼文件显示，爱马仕继承人尼古拉-普希（Nicolas Puech）在一起民事案件中起诉了伯纳德-阿尔诺（Bernard Arnault）及其 LVMH 奢侈品集团等各方，普希声称自己被剥夺了爱马仕的股份，这些股份目前价值数十亿欧元。【原文：Hermes heir Nicolas Puech has sued Bernard Arnault and his LVMH luxury conglomerate, among other parties, in a civil case related to Puech's claim that he was deprived of Hermes shares now worth billions of euros, according to a filing of his lawsuit reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 宝马设定新的中期气候目标
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马（BMW）周二表示，其目标是到 2035 年将二氧化碳当量排放量从 2019 年的水平至少减少 6000 万公吨，并在 2050 年实现净零排放的长期目标范围内设定了新的中期目标。【原文：German carmaker BMW aims to cut its CO2 equivalent emissions by at least 60 million metric tons by 2035 from 2019 levels, it said on Tuesday, setting new mid-term goals within the longer-term target of achieving net zero by 2050.】

item.title: 波音首席财务官预计明年 737 和 787 喷气式飞机交付量将增加
item.description: 波音公司财务总监周二表示，预计明年 737 和 787 喷气式飞机的交付量将会增加，这使得该飞机制造商的股价在早盘交易中上涨了约 6%。【原文：Boeing expects higher deliveries for its 737 and 787 jets next year, its finance chief said on Tuesday, sending shares of the planemaker up about 6% in morning trading.】

item.title: 云数据创业公司 Eon 在最新一轮融资中估值飙升至 40 亿美元
item.description: 云数据管理初创公司 Eon 表示，它在 Gil Capital 领投的新一轮融资中筹集了 3 亿美元，其估值几乎增加了两倍，达到 40 亿美元。【原文：Cloud data-management startup Eon said it has raised $300 million in a new funding round led by Gil Capital and that its valuation has almost tripled to $4 billion.】

item.title: RTX 公司获得价值 16 亿美元的 F135 发动机维护合同
item.description: RTX 公司周二表示，该公司已获得一份价值 16 亿美元的 F135 发动机维护合同，该发动机为洛克希德-马丁公司的 F-35 战斗机提供动力。【原文：RTX said on Tuesday it has secured a $1.6 billion sustainment contract related to its F135 engines, which power variants of Lockheed Martin's F-35 fighter jets.】

item.title: Adobe Analytics称，在为期五天的假日购物期间，美国网络销售额激增至442亿美元
item.description: Adobe Analytics 的一份报告显示，美国购物者在 "网络星期一 "消费了 142.5 亿美元，将感恩节周末的网上销售总额推高至 442 亿美元，因为消费者对从小玩意到家庭必需品的各种优惠一抢而空。【原文：U.S. shoppers spent $14.25 billion on Cyber Monday, pushing total online sales over the Thanksgiving weekend to $44.2 billion, according to an Adobe Analytics report, as consumers lapped up offers on everything from gadgets to household essentials.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧佩克+成员国将根据新计划接受年度石油产能审计
item.description: 欧佩克+"消息人士称，从明年开始，"欧佩克+"成员国将对其石油生产能力进行年度评估，评估结果将在2027年使用，以确保该组织制定的产量配额更符合每个国家的实际能力。【原文：OPEC+ members will undergo an annual assessment of their oil production capacity starting next year for use in 2027, OPEC+ sources said, to ensure that the group sets output quotas that are more closely aligned with each country's real capacity.】

item.title: 迈克尔-戴尔和苏珊-戴尔将向 2500 万美国儿童的投资账户投入 250 美元
item.description: 迈克尔-戴尔（Michael Dell）和他的妻子苏珊-戴尔（Susan Dell）将向 2500 万美国儿童的投资账户各存入 250 美元，作为特朗普政府 "投资美国"（Invest America）倡议的一部分，他们将承诺提供 62.5 亿美元的慈善资金。【原文：Michael Dell and his wife Susan Dell will deposit $250 each in the investment accounts of 25 million American children, in a $6.25 billion philanthropic pledge as part of the Trump administration's Invest America initiative.】

item.title: 加速硬件仿真的软件公司 Vinci 募集到 3600 万美元资金
item.description: Startup Vinci 公司周二表示，它已筹集到 3600 万美元，用于资助其软件开发业务，该软件可通过显著加快芯片和其他硬件设计的模拟速度。【原文：Startup Vinci said on Tuesday it has raised $36 million to finance its business of building software that can speed chip and other hardware design by significantly accelerating the simulation of such devices.】

item.title: 亚马逊因Shein和Temu价格战削减欧洲卖家费用
item.description: 亚马逊正在削减向欧洲卖家收取的费用，以应对来自 Shein 和 Temu 等以低价销售服装、家居用品和小工具的市场的竞争。【原文：Amazon is cutting the fees it charges sellers in Europe as it responds to competition from marketplaces like Shein and Temu that sell clothes, homeware and gadgets at rock-bottom prices.】
